title: Multiplayer Practice Tool request!
body:
Testing against a bot and without anyone else is definitely not enough to train our skills. Adding at least 1 or 3 people to this mode, would keep people from playing it for fun, but allow people to test new stuff, practice skillshots or test specific interactions, as well as bugs.

It would greatly benefit League of Legends gameplay, competitive scene and positively affect League community.
